text: Jan 12 Robert Walters Plc said on Tuesday its fourth-quarter net fee income fell 24% as the British recruiter continued to battle a hiring slowdown during the COVID-19 pandemic.The company, which operates in more than 30 countries, said its net fee income fell to 71.4 million pounds ($96.75 million) for the fourth quarter ended Dec. 31 from 94.2 million pounds a year earlier.
